com.mapspeople.ui

Class FloorSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.mapspeople.ui.FloorSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class FloorSelector
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    View that holds the floor level buttons

    • Method Detail

      • setOnFloorSelectedListener

        public void setOnFloorSelectedListener(OnFloorSelectedListener callback)
        Register a floor select event listener
        Parameters:
        callback - The floor select listener object

      • createFloors

        public void createFloors(java.util.List<Floor> floors)
        Create the buttons based on a list of floors
        Parameters:
        floors - The list of floors

      • addToView

        public void addToView(android.view.ViewGroup view)
        Add the floor selector view to a parent view, e.g. a Google map view. Floor selector will be placed upper right.
        Parameters:
        view - The parent view

      • setFloor

        public void setFloor(int floor)
        Set the current floor level index, and make the corresponding button active.
        Parameters:
        floor - The new floor to select

      • updateUI

        public void updateUI(android.view.View button)
        Update ui.
        Parameters:
        button - the button

      • createFloors

        public void createFloors(Building currentBuilding)
        Create the floor selector buttons based on a building. If a building has less than or equal to one floor, the floor selector will not display.
        Parameters:
        currentBuilding - The building to create floor selector from.

      • clearUI

        public void clearUI()
        Remove all floor buttons
